Common Operations on Matrix Objects

Source: R/AllGenerics.R, R/operators.R
operator.Rd

Performs common operations on DataMatrix objects.

# S4 method for DataMatrix,DataMatrix
Arith(e1, e2)

# S4 method for DataMatrix,matrix
Arith(e1, e2)

# S4 method for DataMatrix,numeric
Arith(e1, e2)

# S4 method for DataMatrix,logical
Arith(e1, e2)

# S4 method for DataMatrix,DataMatrix
Compare(e1, e2)

# S4 method for DataMatrix,matrix
Compare(e1, e2)

# S4 method for DataMatrix,numeric
Compare(e1, e2)

# S4 method for DataMatrix,DataMatrix
Logic(e1, e2)

# S4 method for DataMatrix,matrix
Logic(e1, e2)

# S4 method for DataMatrix,numeric
Logic(e1, e2)

# S4 method for DataMatrix,logical
Logic(e1, e2)

# S4 method for DataMatrix
Math(x)

# S4 method for DataMatrix
Math2(x, digits)

# S4 method for DataMatrix
Summary(x, ..., na.rm = FALSE)

Arguments

x, e1, e2

An object (typically a DataMatrix object).
digits

A numeric value giving number of digits to be used in round or signif.
...

Further arguments passed to or from methods.
na.rm

A logical scalar: should missing values be removed?

Group Generics

DataMatrix objects have support for S4 group generic functionality to operate within elements across objects:

Arith

"+", "-", "*", "^", "%%", "%/%", "/"

Compare

"==", ">", "<", "!=", "<=", ">="

Logic

"&", "|"

Ops

"Arith", "Compare", "Logic"

Math

"abs", "sign", "sqrt", "ceiling", "floor", "trunc", "cummax", "cummin", "cumprod", "cumsum", "log", "log10", "log2", "log1p", "acos", "acosh", "asin", "asinh", "atan", "atanh", "exp", "expm1", "cos", "cosh", "cospi", "sin", "sinh", "sinpi", "tan", "tanh", "tanpi", "gamma", "lgamma", "digamma", "trigamma"

Math2

"round", "signif"

Summary

"min", "max", "range", "prod", "sum", "any", "all"

Author

N. Frerebeau

Examples

## Create count data matrix
A <- CountMatrix(data = sample(0:10, 100, TRUE), nrow = 20, ncol = 5)
B <- CountMatrix(data = sample(0:10, 100, TRUE), nrow = 20, ncol = 5)

## Arith
A + B

#>       col1 col2 col3 col4 col5
#> row1     7   11    6   14   10
#> row2     5    8   11    7   14
#> row3     9    5   13   11   10
#> row4     9   10   11    5   11
#> row5     8   19   10   12   10
#> row6     8    8    2    4    8
#> row7     5    9   11    5    8
#> row8    15    5    3   15   12
#> row9     7    5   13   14    9
#> row10    5    9   10    3    7
#> row11    9   14   11   12   12
#> row12    8   13   12    8   16
#> row13   12   10   15   16    8
#> row14    3    9    0    2   11
#> row15    7    0    5    6   11
#> row16    4    8   13   15    0
#> row17    0    0   15   18   12
#> row18    4   16   11   10    9
#> row19   15    9    7   18    6
#> row20    6    5   17    4   10
A * 2

#>       col1 col2 col3 col4 col5
#> row1    12   18   10   16    8
#> row2     2    0    6    6   12
#> row3     0    2    8   16    2
#> row4    10   14   20   10    6
#> row5     0   18    6   18   14
#> row6    10   16    0    0    6
#> row7     4    4   10    6   16
#> row8    20    4    6   16   12
#> row9    12    8   12   18    8
#> row10    4   12    0    0    0
#> row11    8    8    6    4    6
#> row12    0   10   12    8   12
#> row13   18   14   10   14    4
#> row14    6    2    0    4    8
#> row15    2    0    0    0   16
#> row16    0    4   10   20    0
#> row17    0    0   14   16    6
#> row18    0   12   18    4   18
#> row19   12   12   12   20    0
#> row20    0   10   18    0   12
A ^ 2

#>       col1 col2 col3 col4 col5
#> row1    36   81   25   64   16
#> row2     1    0    9    9   36
#> row3     0    1   16   64    1
#> row4    25   49  100   25    9
#> row5     0   81    9   81   49
#> row6    25   64    0    0    9
#> row7     4    4   25    9   64
#> row8   100    4    9   64   36
#> row9    36   16   36   81   16
#> row10    4   36    0    0    0
#> row11   16   16    9    4    9
#> row12    0   25   36   16   36
#> row13   81   49   25   49    4
#> row14    9    1    0    4   16
#> row15    1    0    0    0   64
#> row16    0    4   25  100    0
#> row17    0    0   49   64    9
#> row18    0   36   81    4   81
#> row19   36   36   36  100    0
#> row20    0   25   81    0   36

## Compare
A == B

#>        col1  col2  col3  col4  col5
#> row1  FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE
#> row2  FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE
#> row3  FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE
#> row4  FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE
#> row5  FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE
#> row6  FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE

#> row13 FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE

#> row16 FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE  TRUE

#> row18 FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE
#> row19 FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE
#> row20 FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE
A != B

#>        col1  col2  col3  col4  col5
#> row1   TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE
#> row2   TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE
#> row3   TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE
#> row4   TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE
#> row5   TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE
#> row6   TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE
#> row7   TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE
#> row8   TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE FALSE
#> row9   TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE
#> row10  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE
#> row11  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE
#> row12  TRUE  TRUE FALSE FALSE  TRUE
#> row13  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE
#> row14  TRUE  TRUE FALSE  TRUE  TRUE
#> row15  TRUE FALSE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE
#> row16  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE FALSE
#> row17 FALSE FALSE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE
#> row18  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE
#> row19  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE
#> row20  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE
A > 5

#>        col1  col2  col3  col4  col5
#> row1   TRUE  TRUE FALSE  TRUE FALSE
#> row2  FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE  TRUE
#> row3  FALSE FALSE FALSE  TRUE FALSE
#> row4  FALSE  TRUE  TRUE FALSE FALSE

#> row14 FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE

#> row17 FALSE FALSE  TRUE  TRUE FALSE
#> row18 FALSE  TRUE  TRUE FALSE  TRUE
#> row19  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE FALSE
#> row20 FALSE FALSE  TRUE FALSE  TRUE
A < 5

#>        col1  col2  col3  col4  col5
#> row1  FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE  TRUE
#> row2   TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE FALSE

## Logic
A & B

#>        col1  col2  col3  col4  col5
#> row1   TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE
#> row2   TRUE FALSE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE
#> row3  FALSE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE
#> row4   TRUE  TRUE  TRUE FALSE  TRUE
#> row5  FALSE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE
#> row6   TRUE FALSE FALSE FALSE  TRUE
#> row7   TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE FALSE
#> row8   TRUE  TRUE FALSE  TRUE  TRUE
#> row9   TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE
#> row10  TRUE  TRUE FALSE FALSE FALSE
#> row11  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE
#> row12 FALSE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE
#> row13  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE
#> row14 FALSE  TRUE FALSE FALSE  TRUE
#> row15  TRUE FALSE FALSE FALSE  TRUE
#> row16 FALSE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE FALSE
#> row17 FALSE FALSE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE
#> row18 FALSE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE FALSE
#> row19  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE FALSE
#> row20 FALSE FALSE  TRUE FALSE  TRUE

#>        col1  col2  col3 col4  col5
#> row1   TRUE  TRUE  TRUE TRUE  TRUE

## Math
sqrt(A)

#>           col1     col2     col3     col4     col5
#> row1  2.449490 3.000000 2.236068 2.828427 2.000000
#> row2  1.000000 0.000000 1.732051 1.732051 2.449490
#> row3  0.000000 1.000000 2.000000 2.828427 1.000000
#> row4  2.236068 2.645751 3.162278 2.236068 1.732051
#> row5  0.000000 3.000000 1.732051 3.000000 2.645751
#> row6  2.236068 2.828427 0.000000 0.000000 1.732051
#> row7  1.414214 1.414214 2.236068 1.732051 2.828427
#> row8  3.162278 1.414214 1.732051 2.828427 2.449490
#> row9  2.449490 2.000000 2.449490 3.000000 2.000000
#> row10 1.414214 2.449490 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000
#> row11 2.000000 2.000000 1.732051 1.414214 1.732051
#> row12 0.000000 2.236068 2.449490 2.000000 2.449490
#> row13 3.000000 2.645751 2.236068 2.645751 1.414214
#> row14 1.732051 1.000000 0.000000 1.414214 2.000000
#> row15 1.000000 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 2.828427
#> row16 0.000000 1.414214 2.236068 3.162278 0.000000
#> row17 0.000000 0.000000 2.645751 2.828427 1.732051
#> row18 0.000000 2.449490 3.000000 1.414214 3.000000
#> row19 2.449490 2.449490 2.449490 3.162278 0.000000
#> row20 0.000000 2.236068 3.000000 0.000000 2.449490

## Summary
max(A)

#> [1] 10
min(A)

#> [1] 0
range(A)

#> [1]  0 10
prod(A)

#> [1] 0
sum(A)

#> [1] 414
any(A)

#> [1] TRUE
all(A)

#> [1] FALSE
